BasicInfo.short: Survata conducts consumer surveys for companies of all sizes. We pioneered a new model for interviewing consumer via online publishers.

Products.name: Survata Segmented Products
Products.description: Understand pre-defined audiences from popular 2nd and 3rd party data segments.

Products.name: Survata Market Research
Products.description: Market research powered by distributed surveywalls

Products.name: Survata Publisher Network
Products.description: Monetize website or mobile content and experiences with a surveywall to gate them

Products.name: Survata Retargeted Surveys
Products.description: Reach your own audience after they leave your site or view your ads

Products.name: Survata B2B Surveys
Products.description: Target business professionals, from IT decision makers to medical workers
